channel.title: Voids how to add em and where to add
channel.description: This is a kinda of a request i don't really understand the tuts like "now add this void" Maybe someone can explain me how to use and where to use it and how u make them... i tryed mod taharok tut but i didn't really help me

item.title: Voids how to add em and where to add
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

find a public void lets take
this void

public void neadminather()
{
for(int y1 = 0; y1 <= 24; y1++)
{
if ((min == 20 || min == 40 || min == 59) && sec == 1)
{
sendMessage("Changing weather!");
sendMessage("Current time: "+hour24+" hours "+min+" mins");
IsSnowing = randomWeather();
sendMessage("Weather changed!");
saveweather();
}
}

and u wanted to add this void

public void weather()
{
if (hour24 > 6 && hour24 <= 12)
{	        nightTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		morningTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 12 && hour24 <= 18)
{	        nightTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		morningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 18 && hour24 <= 23)
{	
                nightTime = false;
		morningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		eveningTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 0 && hour24 <= 6)
{	
                 morningTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		nightTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}
}

then they would become like this

public void neadminather()
{
for(int y1 = 0; y1 <= 24; y1++)
{
if ((min == 20 || min == 40 || min == 59) && sec == 1)
{
sendMessage("Changing weather!");
sendMessage("Current time: "+hour24+" hours "+min+" mins");
IsSnowing = randomWeather();
sendMessage("Weather changed!");
saveweather();
}
}
}


public void weather()
{
if (hour24 > 6 && hour24 <= 12)
{	        nightTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		morningTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 12 && hour24 <= 18)
{	        nightTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		morningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 18 && hour24 <= 23)
{	
                nightTime = false;
		morningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		eveningTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}

if (hour24 > 0 && hour24 <= 6)
{	
                 morningTime = false;
		eveningTime = false;
		afternoonTime = false;
		nightTime = true;
                setTime(); 
}
}

that helped bit more?

Read full topic

item.title: Voids how to add em and where to add
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Huh?

If you open Client Java,
Hold Ctrl and F,
Search,

Public Void

That’s a Public Void, You can add one above this.
